revised_title: Crystallographical Study of Double Selenates of Zinc Salts
tldr: The author investigated the crystallographical properties of double selenates of zinc salts, focusing on the morphological axial angle, atomic weight, and molecular volumes. The study found that the rubidium zinc salt's properties were intermediate between the potassium and caesium zinc selenate salts, with the molecular volumes showing a progression in the order of the atomic weights of the alkali metals.
